00048 typedef struct {
00050         TFileInfo FileInfo;
00052         TIplText History;
00054         ORIGIN Origin;
00056         UINT32 Width;
00058         UINT32 Height;
00060         UINT32 TotalSize;
00062         UINT16 ByteWidth; 
00064         UINT16 BorderSize;

00070         FLOAT32** ppMatrixIm;
00073         FLOAT32* pPixelStreamRe;
00076         FLOAT32* pPixelStreamIm;
00079         FLOAT32** ppAllScanLinesRe;
00082         FLOAT32** ppAllScanLinesIm; 
00083 } TComplexImage;
